body.name: Gaiatop USB Desk Fan, 3 Speeds with Strong Airflow, 5.5 Inch Quiet Small Portable Table Fan, 90° Rotate Personal Cooling Fan For Bedroom Home Office Desktop Travel (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 56 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: 3-Speed Adjustable: The desk fan is equipped with 3-speed airflow. Speed 1: soft wind, 3.1m/s, 1500rpm; Speed 2: high wind, 4.0m/s, 2000rpm; Speed 3: strong wind, 4.8m/s, 2500rpm. 3 wind speeds of the USB fan can reach your various cooling demands.

Ultra Quiet: With upgraded motor, the table fan has stronger wind and less noise，max wind speed reaches 4.8m/s at highest speed. The personal fan is powerful and quiet enough to give you a comfortable working and resting environment.

Small & Light Portable Fan: The travel fan size is only 5.5*5.9*2.2in, and about 6.5oz lightweight, so it can be easily carried in your bag for traveling. The cooling fan comes with a 4.9ft long cord, it's great for home, office, dorm, library, bedside and car. You can enjoy the coolness of summer at anytime and anywhere.

USB Powered Fan: The mini fan is USB powered, you can directly connect by PC/laptop, power bank, AC adapter, car charger or other USB-enabled power supply. Small fan is more energy-saving and more friendly to your electricity bill. (NOTE: No wall charger included)

Stable & Easy to Clean: The desktop fan can be tilted 90° to meet your different needs. The wide base is equipped with 4 rubber pads to reduce vibration and prevent the fan from slipping even when it's running at high speed. The front cover of the fan can be detached for easy cleaning of the fan blades.

Detachable Cover You can easily take off the desk fan cover and put it back on Easy to Clean After removing the usb fan cover, you can use a rag to clean the fan blades and cover

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The desktop USB fan is a compact and efficient cooling while providing a gentle breeze for a comfortable work environment. The quiet operation ensures minimal disturbance, making it a practical addition to any workspace. The USB connectivity adds convenience, allowing users to power it with various devices. Overall, a reliable and user-friendly choice for staying cool at the desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for an RV
reviews.reviewText: Well constructed, whisper quiet except for a very minor vibration. Wanted a small portable fan to move air around in my RV on those days, both hot and cold, that it was necessary to keep it closed up. This fan is perfect, 3 speeds, compact and quiet. Run it 24 hours a day, when in use, and it is exactly what is needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As it’s a usb fan I had very low expectations, but the power on this thing is actually good! I can feel a current of air even when standing a few feet away. I’ve used other desktop usb fans but this is the first that actually FEELS like a fan. Most just give off an insulting whisper of a breeze, but this guy actually cools. It’s winter where I’m at so my workplace only gets so hot, but I’m looking forward to this fan keeping me sane in the summer. The color selection is fun, decent size. Build is plastic, but so long as you don’t chuck it across the room I don’t see it easily coming apart. For the price you really can’t go wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How did I live without this!?
reviews.reviewText: Nice size, three different speeds, all of which are powerful! Previously bought two different fans for my nightstand as I need a fan to sleep. Neither lasted for more than a month. This fan is so powerful, even on the lowest speed! Quiet but drowns out sounds from other rooms, light white noise but softer. I’d definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great price. Great fan.
reviews.reviewText: I wish I had bought this at the beginning of summer! Since this summer has been record high temperatures we didn’t want to overwork our AC. My bedroom was so hot, plus I was also having hot flashes/night sweats. I chose this fan specifically for the price and the good reviews. I’ve had it for several weeks now and it has been awesome. It’s just the perfect size for my bedtray. It’s easy to operate and I am impressed with the speed settings as it gets pretty strong on the 3rd setting. It’s light, portable and it’s really quiet even on the last setting.My only issue with it is the cord being attached to the fan itself. I would’ve rather used a mini usb to usb cable for the length I needed which I have several of already. As it stands I had to buy a usb extension cord to be able to reach where I wanted to place it. For the price though it’s totally worth it. It’s a really great fan, especially on a budget. I would absolutely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect desk companion.
reviews.reviewText: I usually take an hour walk in the office on my lunch break. Feeling a bit warm when I get back in the office; this fan was a lifesaver to cool you off and of course on hot summers days. While I leave this at work, I can easily bring it with me since it's light and portable. Also very quiet.Worth checking out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this fan because my other small one broke. I have to say I’m very impressed with the 1st setting. Although it’s supposed to be low, it’s definitely a very strong small fan. I use small fans to sleep because I sweat after a while 😕 so having a small fan helps me cool down as I sleep. It’s nice and small and so cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable fan
reviews.reviewText: A bit smaller than I thought it would be, but it is powerful!!! Even on low it gives a good steady breeze. Medium is strong and the High setting will actually dry my thick hair. It's also extremely quiet. It's also adjustable (tilts up or down only). If you're looking for a good small portable desk fan, this is perfect. For the price, absolutely can't be beat.
